summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3901 for the improvement of 7th Avenue North, from Highland Drive to Lee Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; and Comstock Street, from 6th Avenue North to 7th Avenue North; by the constructing of concrete sidewalks, together with the necessary cross walks; under Ordinance No. 47553, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
